org.sakaiproject.site.impl

Class SiteCacheImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.site.impl.SiteCacheImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, net.sf.ehcache.event.CacheEventListener, org.sakaiproject.memory.api.DerivedCache

    public class SiteCacheImpl
extends Object
implements org.sakaiproject.memory.api.DerivedCache, net.sf.ehcache.event.CacheEventListener

    SiteCacheImpl is a cache tuned for Site (and page / tool) access.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected org.sakaiproject.memory.api.Cache m_cache
      The base cache.

      Map of a tool id to a cached site's tool configuration instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SiteCacheImpl

        public SiteCacheImpl(org.sakaiproject.memory.api.MemoryService memoryService,
             long sleep,
             String pattern,
             org.sakaiproject.component.api.ServerConfigurationService serverConfigurationService)
        Construct the Cache. No automatic refresh: expire only, from time and events.
        Parameters:
        sleep - The number of seconds to sleep between expiration checks.
        pattern - The "startsWith()" string for all resources that may be in this cache - if null, don't watch events for updates.

      • SiteCacheImpl

        public SiteCacheImpl(org.sakaiproject.memory.api.MemoryService memoryService,
             long sleep,
             String pattern)

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public void put(Object key,
       Object payload,
       int duration)
        Cache an object
        Parameters:
        key - The key with which to find the object.
        payload - The object to cache.
        duration - The time to cache the object (seconds).

      • containsKey

        public boolean containsKey(Object key)
        Test for a non expired entry in the cache.
        Parameters:
        key - The cache key.
        Returns:
        true if the key maps to a non-expired cache entry, false if not.

      • get

        public Object get(Object key)
        Get the non expired entry, or null if not there (or expired)
        Parameters:
        key - The cache key.
        Returns:
        The payload, or null if the payload is null, the key is not found, or the entry has expired (Note: use containsKey() to remove this ambiguity).

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear all entries.

      • remove

        public void remove(Object key)
        Remove this entry from the cache.
        Parameters:
        key - The cache key.

      • getTool

        public org.sakaiproject.site.api.ToolConfiguration getTool(String toolId)
        Access the tool that is part of a cached site, by tool Id.
        Parameters:
        toolId - The tool's id.
        Returns:
        The ToolConfiguration that has this id, from a cached site.
